TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. Your wish only applies in your least favorite country.

I wish for it to be spring. A world of comfortable temperatures and completely clear weather. No big waves. Just completely calm and no death, destruction, disorder, or anything bad. Where I am. (Good luck corrupting this one)

Granted: It's a world of comfortable temperatures and completely clear weather. No big waves. Just completely calm and no death, destruction, disorder, or anything bad. Where you're at.

So you're quite relieved from the regular troubles you have as a homeless person.

I wish I could come up with something to corrupt Sun's next potential wish.

DENIED.

I wish for it to be spring. A world of comfortable temperatures and completely clear weather. No big waves. Just completely calm and no death, destruction, disorder, or anything bad. Where I am. Living the life of the average, middle-class American. (Good luck corrupting this one)

Granted. You need to pay taxes now that you're no longer homeless ._.

I wish for it to be spring. A world of comfortable temperatures and completely clear weather. No big waves. Just completely calm and no death, destruction, disorder, or anything bad. Where @Sun lives. Living the life of the average, middle-class American.

>:^]

Granted. But you're a middle-class citizen too, so you also have to pay taxes!

I wish I had the newest iPod. So original, I know.

Granted. Good luck assembling it.

I wish more people would comment on my avatar.

(Speaking of which, what do you think of this GIF?:

Granted. Your avatar is depressed and runs away.

(is that a heart shape in the mud?)

I wish for a railgun.

Granted. It is designed as a shoulder mounted weapon which lays train track rails. It is extremely heavy to pick up, and you are forever stuck laying the nation's railroads.

I wish to live twice as long as I normally would.

Granted. But a math paradox cuts your life in HALF.

I wish someone would change their avatar to .

Granted, But when i tried it said picture is too big. Oh well.

I wish Sun would get stuck in mud while wearing rubber boots.

Granted, but I would be happy about it. It's happened before. And I wasn't scared at all. True story.

I wish Overfloater or one of the people who usually replies to me would learn that mud is fun.

Granted, but the sun destroys the planet.

I wish for more science.

Granted. You can only do it while standing here:

I wish someone would repost this GIF:

Granted, but since I deleted it from the internet (see king of the hill) it is imposibru

I wish imposibru was an actual word.

Granted. It is now the only word in the English language.

I wish for Sun to only use mud gifs/pics entirely related to ksp (like jebediah kerman landing in mud).

MWHAHAHAHA!

Sorry, but kerbals and my gifs do NOT go together.

I wish people would stop hating on GIFs.

Granted. They now love gifs, but hate mud.

I wish for fewer ninja powers.

Granted. The other ninjas capture you.

I wish people would love GIFs and mud, so I can post my GIFs without people getting a bit irritated.

Granted. Once people begin loving gifs and mud, your repository of muddy gifs dies in a catastrophic hard isk crash. (Back up your muddy gifs!)

I wish for the next post to contain no corruption.

Granted.

I wish for Sun to stop posting that gif over and over again.

Granted, now he posts this gif.

I wish somebody would update PlatinumSpore.

What's that? (BTW I'm going to stop posting GIFs for a while.)

I wish I knew which update would add the rest of the planets to the KSP solar system.

Granted. It's 0.63.

I wish to have some influence over KSP's development direction.

Granted. They strike.

I wish nothing not break.

Granted. Everything breaks, thanks to double negatives.

I wish to know much more than the next leading brand.
